1_Abstract_and_Purpose.notes: Abstract and purpose provided in nrdc_central_code_document.md

2_System_Architecture_and_Modules.notes: High-level architecture and component responsibilities documented

3_Functional_Description.notes: Detailed data flow and endpoint behavior included

4_Source_Code_Metadata_and_Originality.notes: Source files listed and an external verification snippet provided; exact checksums need to be generated and embedded by the applicant or with auditor permission

5_Author_and_Ownership_Declaration.notes: Declaration template provided in nrdc_central_code_document.md and originality_statement.txt

compliance_summary: All NRDC guideline sections have coverage in the central document. To finalize compliance, the applicant should compute and embed exact file checksums, include third-party license texts or references, and sign the author declaration in the MD and TXT artifacts provided.
blocking_items_for_submission: Exact file checksums and sizes (see verification snippet)
Copies or clear references to each third-party dependency license
